info.title: LegislationText
info.description:
Handles all Legislation Text information

# Authentication

<!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->

get.summary: Gets a list of Text Dispositions
Gets a list of Legislation Text Actions
Gets a list of Sponsor Types
Gets a list of Legislation Versions
Gets a list of Legislation Text

parameters.name: legislationNumber
parameters.description: Bill numbers, comma separated, zero padded. (eg., "HB0012,SB0021")

get.summary: Get a list of Legislation Text by unique identifier
Gets Legislation Draft Text by unique identifier
Returns PDF for either Legislation or an Impact Statement by reference number

post.summary: Gets a list of hit counts in legislation texts based on set of Legislation Text IDs and keywords

get.summary: Clear all cache for this controller

AmendmentAction.description: AmendmentAction contains a single action in the amendment and the line afftected e.g: Strike and Insert

AmendmentChange.description: AmendmentChange that contains list of changes in the amendment e.g: Strikes and Inserts

amendmentChanges.description: Amendment Changes e.g: Strikes and Inserts

AmendmentItem.description: AmendmentItem Model - for breaking up the legislation amendment drafttext into json object

LegislationsTextGetResponse.description:
Request and Response object containing a list of LIS Legislation Texts (using LegislationTextGetResponse). 
If no valid response could be obtained, Success boolean will be false and additional information can be 
found in the FailureMessage string.

LegislationTextActionResponse.description: building element for legislation action list

LegislationTextDraftResponse.description: Slim class for used to get Legislation Draft from Legislation service call to legislationText

TextFormat.description: LIS TextFormat PDF, HTML or Impact

DocumentCode.description: bill number with versioning (legacy) eg., HB11H1

DraftTitle.description: LIS legislation title or LDTtitle --typical for most bills, but not required for all legislation

Sponsor.description: Body that authored/sponsored the Legislation Text (House/Senate/Conference/Governor)

SponsorTypeID.description: unique identifier for sponsor type (e.g. 1=House of Delegates, 2=Senate, 3=Committee, 4=Member, etc)

IsPublic.description: Is this text available to the public

GovernorsRequest.description: Is this at the Request of the Governor?

DLSPrepared.description: Is this text prepared by DLS?

ConsentRequired.description: Is consent required for this text?

IsPlural.description: does this contain multiple items e.g. amendments?

TextDispositionID.description: unique identifier for Text Disposition (e.g. 1=Offered, 2=Recommended, 3=Reported, etc)

TextDisposition.description: Text Disposition (e.g. Offered, Recommended, Reported, etc)

CommitteeNumber.description: Committee assigned number(Example: H01, S01 or 001)

LegislationClassID.description:
LegislationClassID further identifies type of legislation beyond the standard Joint/Bill/Resolution defined with Legislation Type Code
1	Legislation
2	Memorial Resolution
3	Commending Resolution
4	Election of Judges
5	Budget

LegislationClass.description: LIS Legislation Description (e.g: memorial or commending resolution)

LegislationTextGetResponse.description:
Response object containing LIS legislation Text information. If no valid response could be obtained, Success  
boolean will be false and additional information can be found in the FailureMessage string.

GovernorsRequest.description: Is this at the Request of the Governor?

LegislationStatusID.description: ID for what legislation status this version correlates to

Suffix.description: The suffix that is added to the end of the legislation number on the printed legislation text

AuthoringLabel.description: legislation version label for authoring purposes

LegislationVersionResponse.description: Different types of versions for legislation

LegislationTextID.description: Database Unique Identifier for Legislation Text

PatronTypeID.description: Databse Unique Identifier for Patron Type ID

PatronBaseModel.description: Patron Base Model - Use this base model for all Patron Objects.

PageCount.description: Page count for a particular bill pdf

PDFFile.description: PDF File object representing storage in Azure Blob Storage

Name.description: Body that can sponsor a Legislation Text (House/Senate/Conference/Governor)

SponsorTypeID.description: unique identifier for sponsor type (e.g. 1=House of Delegates, 2=Senate, 3=Committee, 4=Member, etc)

TextDispositionID.description: unique identifier of the Text Disposition

Bearer.description: Please enter JWT with Bearer into field
Bearer.name: Authorization

tags.name: HeartBeat
tags.description: HeartBeat controller for getting telemetry on service health.

tags.name: PublicActions
tags.description: Public actions Controller used for ONLY reading (not writing) data (Contains GET Verbs)
